# Hawkeye (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 110

*By crying out like a hawk, you improve your eyesight. Distant objects and creatures seem closer and more distinct.*

Your range increment for ranged weapons increases by 50%, and you gain a +5 competence bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (v3.5 Spot) checks.
